name: No One Here Gets Out Alive
name_original: No One Here Gets Out Alive
description:
No One Here Gets Out Alive

Press 'E' to open doors.

A 5-minuet long horror game about a man who murdered a child with a retro feel of old PC games.

the idea came from Reddit,  "game ideas" with help of my friends.

hope you enjoy it.

whole project will be available for download soon ( all the stuff like blueprints arts SFX and ... )
